hero.title: Livalance: Live vital. In balance.
hero.subtitle: Coaching & workshops across sleep, nutrition, activity (kettlebells) and mindfulness — science-based, personal, practical.
hero.trustSignal: Built for founders, leaders, and teams who treat energy as a strategic asset.

metrics.label: gain clarity on their personal wellbeing levers
Remote, hybrid, and onsite — mix & match

highlights.title: Data + empathy
highlights.body: We merge sensors, habit design, and coaching to build routines that last.

highlights.title: Rhythms over dogma
highlights.body: Science translated into flexible protocols that respect ambitious schedules.

highlights.title: Wellbeing as culture
highlights.body: Leaders receive tools to anchor health within their organisation.

pillars.title: The four pillars of Livalance
pillars.description: We combine sleep, nutrition, activity, and mindfulness to craft a rhythm that respects your real life.

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.body: Circadian rhythms, evening rituals, and light hygiene to fuel deeper rest.
focus: Build sleep pressure through daylight & activity
Wind-down structures that soothe the nervous system

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.body: Glucose-friendly plates, protein builders, and flexible prep templates.

activity.title: Activity
activity.body: Kettlebell complexes, mobility, and micro-workouts that fit tight schedules.

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness
mindfulness.body: Tools to counter overload: breathwork, journaling, and nervous system care.

workshopsSection.title: Continuous Glucose Monitoring for Teams
workshopsSection.description: Consent to integration: we guide teams through a 4-week CGM experience with actionable behaviour change.
agenda: Kick-off with medical clearance and GDPR-compliant data flow
Live workshops on nutrition, movement, and sleep — hybrid or onsite
Async check-ins, micro challenges, and concise summaries
Review & transfer: reading the data and locking habits in
workshopsSection.ctaSupporting: We reply within 48 hours with tailored slot suggestions.
outcomes: Concrete habit roadmap across nutrition, sleep & activity
Leadership guide for lasting wellbeing communication
workshopsSection.disclaimer: Note: Livalance does not replace medical care.

programSection.title: Integrated workshops & programmes
programSection.description: We blend sensor-led experiments, live sessions, habit design, and team communication into one seamless flow.
programSection.supporting: Every engagement starts with a shared architecture call and ends with a crystal-clear transfer plan.

bundles.name: Focus Sprint
bundles.description: Two-week intensive with CGM, daily micro nudges, and a synthesis workshop.

bundles.name: Team Journey
bundles.description: Four to six week hybrid journey including leader enablement, async pulses, and reporting.

bundles.name: Season Reset
bundles.description: Quarterly refresh workshops featuring pillar-specific experiments and follow-ups.

programSection.note: All programmes run in German or English and scale with your team size.

socialProof.title: Trusted by founders & hybrid teams
socialProof.description: Health becomes culture when it’s translated into processes. Livalance supports remote and hybrid teams across Europe.

leadMagnet.title: 7-Day Balance Reset
leadMagnet.description: PDF with morning, midday, and evening rituals plus a focused shopping list. Double opt-in, zero spam.
benefits: Structured AM, PM, and evening rituals
leadMagnet.note: Kick off with a micro-structured reset that slips into even the busiest weeks.
leadMagnet.privacy: Double opt-in. Unsubscribe anytime with a single click.

items.question: How do workshops run?
items.answer: We start with a clarity call, co-design the agenda, and plug Cal.com booking links where needed. All assets are bilingual.

items.question: Do I need CGM experience?
items.answer: No. We cover safety checks, GDPR process, and sensor setup. Medical decisions remain with your physician.

items.question: Which languages do you support?
items.answer: German and English — including internal comms templates.

finalCta.title: Ready to rebalance?
finalCta.subtitle: Book a free intro call and we’ll outline your quickest next step.

articles.title: Insights
articles.intro: Articles, scripts, and data summaries to support team wellbeing and personal routines.

visionSection.title: Our orientation
visionSection.vision: Vitality should be a default, not a perk — accessible to teams, founders, and individuals alike.
visionSection.mission: We merge data, habit design, and empathetic coaching to make routines sustainable.
visionSection.outcome: Expected outcome: clarity on personal levers, a shared health language, and measurable energy in day-to-day life.

newsletter.title: Mini prompts & workshop updates
newsletter.description: Monthly email with focus tips, tools, and recipes. Double opt-in.
newsletter.consent: I agree to receive emails according to the privacy policy.
newsletter.success: Thanks! Please confirm via the link in your inbox.
newsletter.error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.intro: Book a time slot or drop us your project. We reply within 24 business hours.
contact.supporting: Let’s design wellbeing structures that thrive in the real world.

workshopsPage.heroSubtitle: Sleep, nutrition, activity & mindfulness modules — onsite or remote, fully GDPR-compliant.
workshopsPage.heroTagline: Modular programmes for leadership teams, company offsites, and wellbeing cohorts.
workshopsPage.flowDescription: We guide you from preparation to transfer with clear owners for every milestone.
workshopsPage.formatsDescription: Combine formats and tailor them to your calendar cadence.
workshopsPage.pricingNote: Pricing depends on team size and support level. Let’s explore what you need.
workshopsPage.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Livalance is not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment.

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: We blend sports science, nutrition, and coaching to make healthy routines stick.
aboutPage.mission: Make vitality the default — with programmes that respect schedules and measure outcomes.
aboutPage.story: Founded by athletes, coaches, and strategists who experienced energy as the bottleneck in startups, agencies, and remote teams.
aboutPage.approach: Analyses, workshops, and habit design combine into an iterative process. Every collaboration ends with clear metrics and follow-up.

pillarsPage.title: The Livalance pillars
pillarsPage.intro: Each pillar comes with its own frameworks, experiments, and resources. Together they form an adaptable wellbeing stack.

sleep.headline: Sleep
sleep.body: Circadian design, light and temperature routines, and evening rituals for deeper rest.

nutrition.headline: Nutrition
nutrition.body: Sequencing, protein focus, meal design, and flexible prep templates.

activity.headline: Activity
activity.body: Kettlebell blocks, mobility staples, and micro workouts for packed calendars.

mindfulness.headline: Mindfulness
mindfulness.body: Down-regulation, breathwork, journaling, and focus rituals to counter overload.

booking.headline: Book instantly
booking.description: Powered by Cal.com — bilingual slots available.
